Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class UpdateBroadcaster

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.UpdateBroadcaster
public class UpdateBroadcaster
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used to send messages to all the players of a game in json format typically for update messages and for chat messages this class has a reference to the game/model because the json format of the messages is created in this class (outside of the model)
